channel.title: Help with Dragon claws!
channel.description:
I just noticed recently that my handcannon has the attack styles chop slash etc. how do i fix this? And i have NOTHING at my dragon claws, only just the signs of attack like this http://prntscr.com/14q4vm
base : PI

item.title: Help with Dragon claws!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

for the handcannon change the animation in combatassistant/make sure the attack style/equip style is correct in itemassistant.
For the dragon claws not entirely sure what you mean lolâ€¦ do you mean special? You have to write a formula that will work for it.

Read full topic
